import React from "react"; import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import SingleProduct from "../datas/Single-product"; import "./Single-page.css"; export const SinglePage = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const productId = parseInt(id, 10); const product = SingleProduct.find((item) => item.id === productId); if (!product) { return
